name: Watamelon's Adventure
description:
You are Watamelon, roll around, jump and collect Watamelon cards. Based on the meme of Tsunomaki Watame(lon), a vtuber.

WASD to move. Space to jump. Mouse to move the camera.

There are two versions: for web browser (HTML5) and to download.

The game is WIP. More stuff to come. Definitely more Watamelons.
